item.description:
I'm really looking forward to the next Sci-fi movie coming out: District 9. It's a movie about crash landed aliens that have been quarantined in an area (District 9) in South Africa for 28 years. And havic errupts when humans enter the quarantined area.

Blue Back Square cinemas in West Hartford Center. Not sure what times will be available yet, but we'll shoot for around 7 PM and see what is available as we get closer to the date.

***Update 08/19***
Unfortunately and oddly enough, District9 is NOT playing at Blue Back. I am moving this to Buckland Hills Cinemas. Please update your RSVP's accordingly. Movie starts at 7:15 PM. We will gather in front of Chatters resturaunt inside between 6:45 PM and 7:00 PM. Then we will head inside the theatre at 7:00 PM.
-Rich
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside in front of Chatters resturaunt
item.name: District 9 Movie
